Economics / Research                        Share / Print                Print      Email      Share       Like                                                                A Vibrant Research Environment   NYU Stern Economics faculty and students conduct research in a number of fields, including :  Industrial Organization International Macroeconomics Economic and Financial History Econometrics  Working Papers Economics faculty working papers are available for you to view online. Please see the Working Paper section at left to locate research papers arranged by year.                                        Partnership with NYU FAS   NYU Stern's Department of Economics cooperates closely with the Department of Economics at the NYU Faculty of Arts and Sciences , with joint seminars and doctoral courses.
